rules_text:
Menace; Mentor
[i]Nohrian Veteran[/i] – When Gunter, Unyielding Protector dies, return him to the battlefield tapped with two stun counters on him.
[i]Forceful Partner [/i]– Whenever Gunter attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
